job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen, implementeren en onderhouden van schaalbare en veilige back-end oplossingen met behulp van ASP.NET Core en Python.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activities of building, deploying, and maintaining software applications, which falls under traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen en bouwen van RESTful API's voor integratie met verschillende front-end systemen.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and building APIs is a fundamental task in software integration and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten om oplossingen te ontwerpen volgens SOLID- en MVC-principes.
job_tasks.justification: Designing solutions according to established principles is a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken met Azure voor deployment, resource management en schaalbaarheid.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase relates to managing infrastructure, deployment, and scalability, which are key aspects of operations and DevOps, aligning with the definition of 1.A.2 even without explicit AI context.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan CI/CD-processen met GitHub Actions en versiebeheer met GitHub.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to CI/CD processes and version control are core DevOps practices, fitting the definition of 1.A.2.

job_tasks.phrase: Ondersteunen van cross-functionele teams bij het integreren van back-end diensten in een microservice architectuur.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating services within a microservice architecture is a core software development and integration task.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with other team members.
This phrase indicates working with and supporting other teams, which is a form of collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses entirely on traditional back-end software development tasks, including API design, integration, microservices, and deployment using standard tools and cloud platforms. There is no mention of any AI, Machine Learning, Generative AI, LLMs, or related concepts, which are the defining characteristics of the other profiles.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about its requirements, focusing on traditional back-end development without any mention of AI or ML. This makes the classification straightforward and unambiguous.
